title: How Blockchain Technology Can Help Your Company
summary: The decentralized nature of blockchain technology means that all data is owned and controlled by the organization that has implemented the technology. Decentralized databases do not have these issues since the organization in question has complete control over their data. Identity management is one of the most important use cases for blockchain in the enterprise. Smart contracts are basically computer programs that are stored in a blockchain network. This prevents them from tampering with contracts, supply chain records, or any other important data that is being managed by the network. We have compiled a list of the top 5 reasons why businesses should adopt blockchain technology.
